text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Everyone believes that Grass<n>Wonder rejects scouting
offers<n>because she lacks the drive to win.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
But the racer I saw training doesn't<n>look like someone
who's simply quiet<n>and gentle.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I want to know the true Grass<n>Wonder.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Ah... Good evening. What are you<n>doing here at this late
hour?
choice_data_list: Actually, I'd like to ask you that myself.
Actually, I'd like to ask you that myself.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Hm?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
I... Well, I lost track of time looking up<n>at the night sky. Hehe,
how silly of me.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
But I should return to the dormitory<n>now... Was there
anything you needed<n>of me? If not, then good night—
choice_data_list:
Are you really not accepting any scouting
offers?

Are you really not accepting any scouting
offers?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Oh, that... I believe I've explained<n>before that I'd refuse...

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
A terrible shame though it may be, my<n>mind is unchanged.
I'm sorry.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Well... Forgive me, but it's a personal<n>matter... That's all I
can say.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She doesn't seem to want to explain,<n>but I can still try to
work the answer<n>out for myself.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
So I think back to that look in her eyes<n>on the course, the
blue flames I saw<n>hidden within. How she really feels...
choice_data_list:
Are you disappointed about placing second in
the tryouts?

Are you disappointed about placing second in
the tryouts?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Oh?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: What drew you to that conclusion?
choice_data_list: I saw your fighting spirit burning in your eyes.
I saw your fighting spirit burning in your eyes.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: My eyes?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: You understood that... just from my<n>eyes?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
A Yamato Nadeshiko is always<n>modest—a soft expression
coupled<n>with a calm demeanor. She must<n>always remain
unflappable and<n>solemn.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: That is the ideal to which I strive, but...

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
I must confess, true serenity still<n>eludes me. The anger I feel
toward my<n>own weakness is not so easy to<n>quell.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: I decided to run of my own volition.The path I mean to master lies on theturf. And to reach its end, to win, I cannot afford to stop running.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
So... I should never have relinquished<n>my hold on victory...
no matter what<n>the course of events.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: And yet!
choice_data_list: You can't forgive yourself for losing?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: ...I cannot.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
The moment I begin to yield, the path<n>to victory will crumble.
In such a<n>halfhearted state, I cannot in good<n>conscience
accept any offer.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Put more plainly, I'm being selfish. It<n>is simply my
preference.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: My apologies, but I should leave—
choice_data_list:
All right. I'll come ask you again once you've
placed first.

All right. I'll come ask you again once you've
placed first.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: What?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Again? You mean to say, you intend<n>on trying to scout me
again?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: You'll wait for months until I race in<n>the next tryouts?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
How do I put this? Surely you can see<n>I am... not the easiest
racer to deal<n>with.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
I never compromise, and once I've<n>made a decision, I never
change my<n>mind.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Because I was dissatisfied with my<n>results, I've refused
every offer just<n>so I can take on the tryouts one more<n>
time.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Even knowing that, do you mean<n>what you say? You will
wait for me?
choice_data_list:
I want to help you in your uncompromising
pursuit of victory.

I want to help you in your uncompromising
pursuit of victory.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Trainer...

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, are you absolutely sure? You<n>do realize that should I
keep failing to<n>achieve victory, you'll be left without<n>a
student to train?
choice_data_list:
Except you're definitely winning the next one,
no?

Except you're definitely winning the next one,
no?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Well, how remarkable. What can I say<n>to that? Hehehe.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: I see you are skilled at motivating me.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: And so, several months later...

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Grass Wonder's going for it! She<n>easily overtakes the lead
and jumps<n>to first!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
She's ahead! What an astounding<n>push! She's left the pack<n>
behind—Grass Wonder takes first<n>plaaace!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Grass Wonder remains determined all<n>the way up to her
beautiful finish.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Afterward...

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: You got first, Graaass!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Yes, I'm rather taken aback.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: What a huge lie! You can't fool me!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Anyway, now you can debut with a<n>clear conscience, right?
Races are<n>gonna be so much hotter! Burning<n>hot!
Scorching! Mucho calienteee!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Congrats, Grass! I'm so excited for<n>the day we race
together!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: I look forward to it as well, hehe.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After responding to her rivals' words<n>with a warm smile,
Grass Wonder<n>approaches me.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Thank you for coming, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Hehe... yes. I've been waiting.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
I should formally introduce myself...<n>My name is Grass
Wonder. I hope for<n>your full guidance and support.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Please help me traverse the path I<n>walk to its end.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Thus begin my days with the<n>unwavering racer, Grass
Wonder!
